vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.3;
father of: Ahiezer (H0295H), Joash (H3101L)
§ Shemaah = "the rumour"
a Benjamite, the Gibeathite, father of Ahiezer and Joash, both mighty warriors of David who joined him at Ziklag
vocabInfos._es_Definition: guerrero; tribu de Benjamín; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示瑪 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "流言"
一位便雅憫的基比亞人, 其子耶薛和毗力在洗革拉投效大衛, 同在大能勇士之列 #代上 12:3|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示玛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "流言"
一位便雅悯的基比亚人, 其子耶薛和毗力在洗革拉投效大卫, 同在大能勇士之列 #代上 12:3|
